resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157481</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3357</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Teaching writing in high school (in grades 11-12)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichtendes Schreiben in der High School (in 
den Graden 11-12)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Écriture d'enseignement dans le lycée (dans les 
catégories 11-12)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escrita ensinando na High School (nas classes 
11-12)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scrittura d'istruzione nella High School (nei 
gradi 11-12)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γράψιμο διδασκαλίας στο γυμνάσιο (στους βαθμούς 
11-12)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Escritura de enseñanza en High School secundaria 
(en grados 11-12)</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The writer of this article which appears in the ETNI magazine RAG,voices her thoughts on the importance of teaching writing and associated skills to students in matriculation English classes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">writing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Verfasser dieses Artikels, der im ETNI 
Zeitschrift Lappen erscheint, äußert ihre Gedanken auf dem Wert des 
Unterrichtens des Schreibens und der verbundenen Fähigkeiten zu den 
Kursteilnehmern matriculation in den englischen Kategorien.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'auteur de cet article qui paraît dans le 
chiffon de magazine d'ETNI, exprime ses pensées sur l'importance 
d'enseigner l'écriture et les techniques associées aux étudiants 
dans les classes anglaises d'immatriculation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O escritor deste artigo que se publica no pano do 
compartimento de ETNI, exprime seus pensamentos na importância de 
ensinar a escrita e habilidades associadas aos estudantes em classes 
inglesas do matriculation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il produttore di questo articolo che è publicato 
nel panno dello scomparto di ETNI, esprime i suoi pensieri 
sull'importanza di istruzione la scrittura e delle tecniche collegate 
agli allievi nei codici categoria inglesi di matriculation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο συγγραφέας αυτού του άρθρου που εμφανίζεται στο 
ΚΟΥΡΈΛΙ περιοδικών ETNI, τις φωνές οι σκέψεις της στη σημασία 
της διδασκαλίας γράφοντας και τις σχετικές δεξιότητες στους 
σπουδαστές στις αγγλικές κλάσεις εγγραφής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El programa de escritura de este artículo que 
aparezca en el trapo del compartimiento de ETNI, expresa sus 
pensamientos en la importancia de enseñar la escritura y habilidades 
asociadas a los estudiantes en clases inglesas del matriculation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schreiben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écriture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vocabulário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scrittura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vocabolario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γράψιμο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">escritura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
